channel.title: [FM] Polish Mafia Mash - Canned from inactivity
channel.description:
## Welcome!
Welcome to the Polish Mafia. Game where all the events, roles and flavor are based on Polish history and culture. The game itself will be plaied sololy in **english** tho.
Cause why wouldn't you learn bit about polish history and culture when playing mafia?
Right?
### Gameplay **Game hosted by:** Vulgard & eevee.
Closed setup. Role madness. Days will be 3 IRL days long Nights will be 1 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Scum has day & night chat on seperate discord server
### Order of operations The Order of Operations we will be using when processing Night Actions is as follows:
[details="OoO"] >**First** Passive Hiding/Commuting Strongman Killing Absorbing Bus Driving Redirecting/Blocking/Jailkeeping Randomizing Protecting Miscellaneous Killing Investigation **Last** [/details]
### Character & role claiming Both are allowed, but you are doing it at your own risk.
### Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### Win cons The Town Wincon is: "You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated, and the town still has members left alive.” The Mafia Wincon is: "You win when the Mafia outnumbers the Town. And all other roles with conflicting wincons are dead.”
Other wincons might or might not exist.
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Players 1. htm 2. Firekitten 3. Sam 4. Celeste 5. Maximus 6. PoisonedSquid 7. Boss110 8. MTheJoker 9. Memesky 10. ~~Livi~~ - Dead day 1 - [color=red]Mafia[/color] 11. ~~Icibalus~~ - Dead day 1 - [color=green]Town[/color] 12. Hippo 13. Shurian 14. Marluxion
### Graveyard:

item.title: [FM] Polish Mafia Mash - Canned from inactivity
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
Great Experiment (Passive) - After every two Experiments, you receive a random Reward, which can only be used once. You can only have one Reward at a time.
Experiment (Night) - You will experiment tonight.
Reward 1: Acid Potion (Night) - Attack a player, ignoring their immunities.
Reward 2: Toxic Gas (Night) - All players who visit you tonight will die alongside you.
Reward 3: Healing Tonic (Night) - Heal a player and cure them from all negative effects.
Reward 4: What is THAT? (Night) - You have attracted higher powers with your research. If you use this ability, you can wield the unknown power of the Host. The effects may vary.

I was legitimately a Juggernaut that could end the game at n8.

Read full topic
